title.rendered: INTECH’s clean energy expertise will ensure safer natural gas transportation through two major gas pipelines in Louisiana

content.rendered:
[vc_row column_spacing=”0px”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1660121559530{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1659531812840{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

INTECH’s services on the project will help its client address growing demand for clean & economical North American energy

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH wins a project for providing Pipeline SCADA complete with Leak Detection System for two major gas pipelines in Louisiana.

INTECH’s solution will help the client achieve its objective of safe natural gas transportation from two offshore sites to an onshore LNG terminal.

Through this project, INTECH continues to strengthen its position as a leading solutions provider for clean energy, with its global HQ in Houston serving as a Center of Excellence for Energy Transition projects.  INTECH’s services on the project will help address the growing global demand for low cost, clean, and reliable North American energy, making sure that clean energy complements renewables to maintain healthy energy supplies for US friends and allies around the globe.

INTECH’s offering includes engineering, supply, integration, commissioning, SAT, and FAT of Pipeline SCADA complete with a robust and reliable leak detection system. The leak detection system will provide sensitive and accurate leak/theft detection capability as per standard performance metrics.

INTECH will also take up programming of RTUs and supply of networking cabinets for the remote offshore locations.

About INTECH’s Pipeline SCADA

INTECH’s Pipeline SCADA safeguards your revenue streams through industry-leading, continuous pipeline monitoring for safe and reliable operations. Our solutions offer monitoring & control with detailed asset visibility, real-time integration & instrumentation, and controllers & safety systems on top of applications for analysis and leak or theft detection.

For more information, please visit: https://www.intechww.com/automation/scada-solutions/pipeline-scada/

About INTECH’s Pipeline Leak Detection Systems

INTECH’s Pipeline Leak Detection Systems protect your pipeline systems against losses from theft, leakages, spills, and other incidents with real-time software-based leak detection.  We cover missing data with soft sensing solutions. We also track scrapers, batches, density, and Drag Reducing Agents (DRAs), which influence measurement data. Our solutions perform estimation, validation, and reconciliations but go beyond simple leak detection by also monitoring for pipeline stress, instrument malfunction, and slackline.

For more information, please visit: https://www.intechww.com/skids-packages/pipeline-leak-detection-systems/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation is a globally renowned system integrator and industrial automation company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies solve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As the world moves towards Industry 4.0, we move along with it and since late 2016, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
